source.49cdbc25:
fig = go.Figure()
pull = [0]*len(sum_counts)
pull[sum_counts.tolist().index(sum_counts.max())] = 0.2
fig.add_trace(go.Pie(values=sum_counts, labels=sum_counts.index, pull=pull))
